profile_positions.description: As Chief Chemist I am responsible for the plant and product quality and the lab
profile_positions.title: Chief Chemist

profile_positions.description:
Member of the board of the Stichting Leis, which has as a purpose 

1. to develop 21st century skills and
2. to create an interest in science and technology in children and (young) adults

To reach these targets, stichting LEIS, by means of hands-on STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering en Mathematics) activities will offer the oportunities to children and (young) adults to experiment with things from their surroundings as a form of problemsolving.

The activities will take place in LEGO Education Innovation Studio's.
profile_positions.title: Bestuurslid (Member of the Board of Trustees)

profile_positions.description:
From october 2012 to november 2016 I've worked as a research chemist at Syncom 

From jan. 2009 untill oktober 2012 I've worked on a PhD research in an interdisciplanary research programm called "Resolve" at Syncom

From 2002 to dec. 2008 I worked as research chemist for Syncom

from 2001 to 2002 I worked as an intern as part of my bachelor education for Syncom
